title: Accounts Assistant
text:
Accounts Assistant
Hays Specialist Recruitment Limited
Looking for a positive and vibrant work environment? We are looking for a conscientious account assistant to join their expanding accounts team. With a minimum of 5 years of experience within an accounts department, the ideal candidate should have exceptional interpersonal skills and a positive mindset, always looking for solutions rather than objections. Sage experience is an additional benefit. As an account assistant, you will be responsible for a variety of roles and responsibilities such as reconciling aged debtors, processing customer refunds and supplier payments, and dealing with invoice queries. offers a full-time, permanent position with an annual salary ranging from £25,000.00 to £30,000.00, company pension, and flexible scheduling from Monday to Friday. Casual dress code and no weekends required. Interested in joining the team? Send your CV with a covering letter and any questions you may have.
Hays EA is a trading division of Hays Specialist Recruitment Limited and acts as an employment agency for permanent recruitment and employment business for the supply of temporary workers. By applying for this job you accept the T&C's, Privacy Policy and Disclaimers which can be found at hays.co.uk
